title: Development of an Online Family Life Education Program: Blended Learning-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: For office/administrative professionals: self-directed learning after work combined with weekend offline workshops

learning_goals: Explain at least three effective communication strategies for home environments through online modules and offline workshops
Establish a family role-sharing plan using digital tools and implement it in a real household for at least two weeks
Create educational materials applying scientific approaches (e.g., neuroscience-based communication methods) for child education through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
